titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the George R. Bogue Scrapbook, "Reminiscences of Football Days at Stanford"
Bogue (George R.) Scrapbook, "Reminiscences of Football Days at Stanford"
titlestmt.author: Daniel Hartwig

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.unittitle: George R. Bogue Scrapbook, "Reminiscences of Football Days at Stanford"
did.abstract: Scrapbook contains clippings, programs, and photographs on his Stanford football career, 1923-27, with a few clippings on his professional football career, 1930, and other subjects, 1927-47. The photographs include images of the 1925 Big Game (between Stanford and UC Berkeley), individual players, game shots of Bogue, coach "Pop" Warner, and the three cows (draped in a sign saying "The Thundering Herd") that led the student parade to send off the team to the 1925 Rose Bowl.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: George R. Bogue Scrapbook, "Reminiscences of Football Days at Stanford" (SC0617). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: George R. Bogue earned his A.B. in economics at Stanford University in 1927 and was a member of the football team.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook contains clippings, programs, and photographs on his Stanford football career, 1923-27, with a few clippings on his professional football career, 1930, and other subjects, 1927-47. The photographs include images of the 1925 Big Game (between Stanford and UC Berkeley), individual players, game shots of Bogue, coach "Pop" Warner, and the three cows (draped in a sign saying "The Thundering Herd") that led the student parade to send off the team to the 1925 Rose Bowl.
